message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.CG, cs.NA 

This paper is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) sub-category as it deals with Light Field processing and rendering, which is a common topic in computer vision research. Additionally, the paper also discusses view interpolation and extrapolation, which are common tasks in computer vision. 

The Graphics (cs.GR) sub-category is also likely as the paper deals with rendering and simulating camera aperture of arbitrary shape and size. 

Multimedia (cs.MM) is another possible sub-category as the paper deals with processing and rendering of Light Fields, which are a type of multimedia data. 

Computer Graphics (cs.CG) is also a possible sub-category as the paper deals with rendering and simulating camera aperture of arbitrary shape and size, which is a common topic in computer graphics research. 

Numerical Analysis (cs.NA) is a less likely sub-category, but it is possible as the paper discusses a regularized least square regression method for obtaining the layers in the Fourier domain, which involves numerical computations.
